TextLang.Text: Hello. I recommend [%1]. Check it out!
To perform this operation, you must quit [%1]. Do you want to quit the software now?
There is not enough free space on the hard disk.
This operation is not available here.
To use this data, you must have the following game:
The matching service is currently undergoing maintenance.
The matching service is busy. Try again later.
Use of the matching service has been suspended for this account.
An error occurred during the save operation.
About Us | Privacy Policy | Terms of Service
The operation cannot be performed. Some PlayStation®Network features are currently undergoing maintenance.
Communication with the server timed out.

To add someone as a Friend, you must exchange a [Request to Add a Friend] message with him or her. First take note of the person's online ID, and then enter it in the following screen to send the [Request to Add a Friend] message. When the person approves your request, he or she will be added to your Friends list.
Enter the online ID for the person you want to add.
The maximum number of people who can be added has been reached.
This person has already been added as a Friend.
A person who you have an active invitation out to cannot be added as a Friend.
Pending response to add as a Friend.
You will compose a grief report against this message to Sony Computer Entertainment. Carefully read the following information, and then select [OK].

You may report a user who is acting inappropriately in breach of the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement to Sony Computer Entertainment ("SCE"). If a user is not violating the Community Code of Conduct as set forth in the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, please do not register a complaint. If you make a false report, this may result in a termination or suspension of your PlayStation®Network account. SCE does not disclose to individual users the status or results of individual complaints.
The grief report has been sent to SCE.
Do you want to add "%1" to your block list? (If you add to the block list, you will no longer receive messages from this person.)
Solicitation for PlayStation®Network Information or Personal Information
Do you want to cancel the message?
You cannot send to persons on your block list.
You can choose recipients by selecting people from your Friends list or players you have met.
Enter your friend's online ID manually. If you use this option, you can send a message to only one person.
There is not enough free space. The save operation stopped.
The maximum number of content items that can be saved has been reached.
The message could not be sent. Check the address.
Do you want to save the attached file?
You can choose all players in a chat room as recipients by selecting a chat room that you have joined.
An error occurred during the add operation.
The maximum size for files that can be attached has been reached.
An error occurred during the download operation. The attached file has been deleted from the server.
An error occurred during the add operation. The request to add to Friends has already been cancelled.
The maximum number of players that can be selected has been reached. You can select up to %1 players.
Start the game you want to join, and then try to join again.
This game data cannot be played using this game.
The message could not be sent.
The message could not be sent to some players.
The online ID you entered has not been registered. Check that you are using the correct online ID.
The person you are sending to is on your block list. The message could not be sent.
The message could not be sent. You are not signed in.
The operation cannot be performed. You are not signed in.
This operation cannot be performed during remote play.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. The message could not be sent.
